title: Halberd of Vigilance
content:
ntinel Weapon: Gain a +1 bonus to initiative rolls and Advantage on Perception Ability Checks.

Adroit Reflexes: When you make an Attack Roll as a reaction, you make it with Advantage.

BG3 Halberd of Vigilance Location & Where to Find

Location: Moonrise Towers Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Lann Tarv after earning favor with Disciple Z'rell and asking for additional help Dropped by: Lann Tarv when assaulting Moonrise Towers

Halberd of Vigilance Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Very Rare Value: 960 W
